description: This file declares functions for obfuscating and unobfuscating data buffers using a passphrase, primarily designed for hiding data within larger buffers. It includes licensing information and documentation describing the purpose and usage of the obfuscation functions.

methods.name: obfuscate
methods.description: Function to obfuscate data into a buffer using a passphrase, providing a way to hide the original data within a larger buffer. Requires freeing the returned buffer.

methods.name: unobfuscate
methods.description: Function to retrieve original data from an obfuscated buffer using the same passphrase. Also requires freeing the returned buffer.
